item.description:
Paddle Mansfield Hollow Lake!


Like last year, I think its easier for everyone to just meet at the boat launch area, we paddle up and down from the bridge, then after we can go to the picnic area with all our cars, its just one drive way away..


Getting There:
Mansfield Hollow Boat Launch:

for GPS use 300 Bassetts Bridge Road Mansfield Center CT, (its close enough)..
mapquest or other...just compare the directions below to what you get..they better be similar..

From I-84 heading EAST, take Exit 68 = south on rte 195 through Storrs to Mansfield ctr (about 11 miles from 84)
Go 0.5 mile past rte 89 junction and turn left onto Bassset Bridge Rd at the stoplight, should see Mansfield Hollow Park sign. (licquer store at the intersection too)
Will see a picknick area on left go a bit further apx 0.5 miles to the access right before the bridge on the left.

From I-384, follow rte 6 to toward Willimantic.
6 and 66 will intersect at a light. Take a left on to 6.
Follow this highway to the second exit, go straight (=rte633 or s. frontage rd.) it is actually a parallel to rte 6 connector to rte 195,
Signs for UCONN should be there somewhere too,
Go North on rte 195 toward UCONN for about 2 miles then turn right at the onto Basset Bridge Rd, same info from here as above.

Available Kayaks are:


The Brown Bathtub= Pungo 12'= Kathy~g
The Blue Flipper= Riot Tourlite 15'= AL-r
The Yellow Bananna= Cobra Expidition SOT 18', includes Paddle Pants= Alex
The Red Eddyliner= Eddyline Wind Dancer 18'= Bill
The Red Greenland= NDK Greenlander Pro 18'= Lori

The Red Hotub= Canoe 18' this one can hold 3 people pretty easily..maybe more..= Jill and Guest

Lisa J will have her kayak loaded on trailer too...

I cant rent to maybe's
item.how_to_find_us: I will have the Blue Toyota Avalon with the Kayak Trailer and look for the ORANGE CONES with reflective stripes on them
item.why: Its a nice day and this is a good place for paddling and a Pot luck Barbie Q just one drive way away.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Mansfield Hollow Paddling Event Meet at Boat Launch/Parking lot Area
